data.title: ICT in CHMS
data.meta_description: ICT in CHMS - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Chung Hwa Middle School has established itself as a leader in technology-integrated education in Brunei. Through intuitive implementation of ICT tools across its 14 departments, the school has achieved national and international recognition, including being named Microsoft's first Showcase School in Brunei. Students are proficient in advanced software like Microsoft Access and Adobe Dreamweaver due to the school's emphasis on developing ICT skills. The school is making progress on virtual learning environments and cloud technology to further personalized education.
